description:
The best food and drink calculator in the whole app store. Over 75 measurement types, packed with charts and guides, constantly updated with new features. No other kitchen calculator can compare to our tool list. We are the brand leader. 

* easy fast converter 
One touch conversion, for the chef in a hurry, one click instant cook book conversion. 

* volume and weight multi view 
Conversion results across multiple weight and volume measurements at the same time. 

* universal unit converter 
Convert any unit measures and amount from 73 different measurement volume types. Plus serving number to rescale your recipe measurements. 

* substance density calculation 

* oven temperature calculator

* meat cooking guide 
Meat recipes made simple, your one stop guide for those in a hurry. 

* meat chef master (It’s like having a meat chef in your kitchen) 
How to cook, what to cook, beef recipes, chicken recipes, if only you went to cooking school. 
Meat recipes made easy? don't struggle again. Take the work out of cooking meat. Simply add the weight of the meat, choose your preference, rare medium or well done, add the serving time, and the calculator does the rest, telling you what to do, at every time interval, every step from start to serving, on time to the table. 
Whether its cooking chicken, or you want to cook turkey, boiled bacon, gammon or ham, roast beef, pork, lamb, duck, to game meat, grouse, pheasant and venison. Nothing can go wrong. The easy dinner - every time meat perfection. 

* vegetable cooking guide, 
Vegetable recipes easy perfect cooking guide, make your selection from the fully extensive vegetable list and our interactive program displays every cooking option and guide for your vegetable meals.
